data.name: Delicacies and Rarities Pack
data.detailed_description:
Adds the following 5 new types of items with rare effects to be used in synthesis:

- Weiss Wheat
(Item traits)
Traits: Ultimate Destruction, Power of Life, and Extra Boost All Stats

- Dunkelheit
(Item traits)
Traits: Nectar of Dusk, Ultimate Recovery, and Resonance All: Heaven

- Dragon Scale
(Item traits)
Traits: Dragon Aura, Enhance and Increase, and Overpowered

- Deep Core
(Item traits)
Traits: Power of Evolution, Dusk Radiance, and Resonance Art: Unrivaled

- Rapier Fish
(Item traits)
Traits: Overpriced, Destruction Legend, and One Hit Kill

fullgame.name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle ~The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings~

data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX550Ti or better, 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OnBoard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i7 3.40GHz over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
